quote.text: Your journey is unfolding exactly as it should. Even the detours are leading somewhere beautiful.
quote.author: Morgan Harper Nichols

scripture.text: And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness. [...] my grace is sufficient for all men that humble themselves before me.
